name: Scuffed Tower Defense
description:
The world's first physics based Tower Defense FPS, Real-Time Strategy (RTS) flying drone futuristic AI game featuring a dog named BUSTER.

This is the premier SCUFFED Tower Defense game on Steam. Set in the far far future where humans have delved into a long virtual sleep to live out their wildest immortal dreams and a network of artificial intelligence personalities are tasked with defending Earth from any deep space threats while they slumber.

You have been activated and will join the ranks of the honorable S.C.U.F.F.E.D. Terrestrial Defense force as an AI with one goal: protect Earth and get some treats (good boy). Although Earth has never faced a real threat in the storied history of the STD program, it is your duty (unavoidable programmed directive) to train and hone your skills (machine learning) so that you will be ready to protect the Earth and it's deep stasis bound inhabitants for the rest of time.

Build towers, expand your base and upgrade your personal drone in order to crush your (simulated) enemies. Get SCUFFED up today.
